summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Smart Trust Score Rules Editor & Governance Compliance Checklists feature. Backend APIs are 90% functional with all core functionality working. Frontend Health Score Rules tab is fully functional with proper validation and save/reset capabilities. Governance Checklists tab has a display issue preventing module selection.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 200 status with error message instead of 400 for validation errors
minor_bugs.impact: Frontend receives successful response but with error content
minor_bugs.details: API correctly validates weights must sum to 100% and returns proper error message, but uses 200 status code instead of 400

ui_bugs.issue: Tab switching not working - checklists content not displaying
ui_bugs.details: Clicking Governance Checklists tab doesn't switch content, still shows Health Score Rules. Module selector buttons (minutes, distribution, etc.) not visible.

integration_issues.issue: Checklists API data not being displayed in UI
integration_issues.details: Backend API /api/config/checklists returns correct data but frontend doesn't render the module selector or checklist items

passed_tests: Settings link visible in sidebar under TOOLS section
Health Score Rules tab displays all 5 category sliders correctly
Weight validation working (shows error when total â‰  100%)
Save Changes button functional and updates configuration
Backend GET /api/config/health-rules returns proper data structure
Backend GET /api/config/checklists returns all 5 module types
Backend PUT /api/config/checklists/{module} updates all module types successfully
Category weight sliders and input fields work correctly
Total weight calculation and display working
Blocking Conditions section present and expandable
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix Governance Checklists tab switching issue - the tab click doesn't change the displayed content. The fetchChecklists() function may not be properly updating the UI state or the conditional rendering for the checklists tab is not working correctly. Backend APIs are working fine, this is a frontend state management issue.

success_percentage.backend: 90% - All APIs functional, minor status code issue
success_percentage.frontend: 75% - Health Score Rules fully working, Checklists tab not displaying
